pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br)Health: 100

Has a 10% chance to spawn from a $(l:gotchard/mobs/malgam)Malgam$(/l)$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Uses his $(l:gotchard/riders/dread#type_three)Type Three$(/l) at under 75 health if you have a $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#tenliner_ride_chemy_card)Tenliner Ride Chemy Card$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops$(li)3-5 $(l:gotchard/items/blank_ride_chemy_card)Blank Ride Chemy Cards$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/replichemy_cards#steamliner_repli_chemy_card)Steamliner Replichemy Card$(/l) (33%)$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/replichemy_cards#unicon_repli_chemy_card)Unicon Replichemy Card$(/l) (33%)$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/replichemy_cards#daiohni_repli_chemy_card)Daiohni Replichemy Card$(/l) (33%)$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/replichemy_cards#madwheel_repli_chemy_card)Madwheel Replichemy Card$(/l) (20%)$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/replichemy_cards#bulletbaang_repli_chemy_card)Bulletbaang Replichemy Card$(/l) (20%)$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/replichemy_cards#apparebushido_repli_chemy_card)Apparebushido Replichemy Card$(/l) (20%)$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/glion_gold_cube)Glion's Golden Cube$(/l) (20%)$(li)1 $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#crosshopper_ride_chemy_card)Crosshopper Ride Chemy Card$(/l) (if you have a $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#tenliner_ride_chemy_card)Tenliner Ride Chemy Card$(/l) in your inventory)
